attributes.action: families & individuals who earn <£30k/yr exempt from tv/water/hightax bills!
attributes.additional_details:
Example
Single hardworking person 24yrs old
Works 40hrs p/w
Earns £1100p/m

Rent £450
Council tax £86
Gas £30
Electric £30
Water £20
Food shopping £100
Household shopping £40
Motorcycle for commuting £83
Insurance £56
Tv liecense £20
House insurance £20
Phone bill £40
Internet £26
Total value £1001p/m
leaves £100 to get dinners,fuel,milk bread etc and this is all that person works a living for? Whats fair about that and Theirs people worse off Wake up! "Charity + growth start at home"
attributes.background: People always moan that they need more growth in the business! but yet squeeze the little worker ants at the bottom who work hard all month. squeeze too much.. we dont buy those things, business doesnt grow, everyone feels a sqeeze. More money down here.. Stop squeezing!! and you will see growth!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking for a specific change to taxes, or for people who earn below a certain amount not to have to pay the TV Licence fee.
